email_Subject: Supply Chain Partner Registration: Final Reminder! Accept {{OPERATION}} Nomination
email_Message:
Hello,

You received a previous email with a call to action to accept or deny a request for nomination as a {{OPERATION}}, for the company shown in the summary. As a {{OPERATION}}, you can manage the users and company details.

Request will expire today.

Mco Company:{{COMPANY_NAME}}
Vendor ID:{{VENDOR_ID}}
Site Address:{{SITE_ADDRESS}}
Mco Company Type:{{COMPANY_TYPE}}

Please accept or deny the nomination request using one of the links shown here.

{{ACCEPT}}
{{DENY}}

It is mandatory to have SC Registration Standard Reports role for a non - SCO user; if you do not currently have access, you may request it through the link below.

{{DISPLAY_LINK2}}

Why am I receiving this notification?
You have been nominated as a {{OPERATION}}.This request will expire today if immediate action is not taken.

Have questions? Email sciam-support@cisco.com

Regards,
Supply Chain Partner Registration team

Cisco ConfidentialCisco Systems, Inc. All rights reserved

email_Subject: Supply Chain Partner Registration: First Reminder! Accept {{OPERATION}} Nomination
email_Message:

You received a previous email with a call to action to accept or deny a request for nomination as a {{OPERATION}}, for the company shown in the summary. As a {{OPERATION}}, you can manage the users and company details.

Request will expire in 7 days.

Vendor ID:{{VENDOR_ID}}
Site Address:{{SITE_ADDRESS}}
Mco Company Type:{{COMPANY_TYPE}}

Please accept or deny the nomination request using one of the links shown here.

{{DENY}}

You have been nominated as a {{OPERATION}} and it is essential to take action, otherwise the system will automatically deny the nomination after 7 days.

Regards,
